translations: n.疯人，狂人（loony 的复数）;<非正式>一加元硬币（loonie 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Thankfully it doesn't, otherwise we would all be running round as complete loonies with all these 'influences' flying at us from all directions.
sentences.translation: 幸亏它们没有，否则我们就会受到所有这些从各个方向射来的“影响力”而像疯子一样乱跑了。

sentences.sentence: In a constitutional convention, the questions will be complex and large.Who would present the evidence, if not the same loonies who cannot agree in the legislature?
sentences.translation: 而在制宪会议上的问题要大而复杂得多，当又一群疯子在议会内意见不一时，谁会来出示证据呢？

sentences.sentence: In a constitutional convention, the questions will be complex and large. Who would present the evidence, if not the same loonies who cannot agree in the legislature?
sentences.translation: 而在制宪会议上的问题要大而复杂得多，当又一群疯子在议会内意见不一时，谁会来出示证据呢？
